com.is2t.mwt.widgets.contracts
Interface UpDownRendererContract

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComboRenderer
public interface UpDownRendererContract

The contract that must be offered by any renderer that wishes to render widgets that expect to be able to translate a pointer position into an "increase" ("next") or a "decrease" ("previous") command.

Renderers implementing this contract can make no assumptions about the specific class the widget that is making the request.

Method Detail

getCommand

int getCommand(ej.mwt.Widget widget,
               int x,
               int y)
Get the command implied by a pointer position of the specified x and y. The returned value should be one of the commands defined in UpDownRendererContract

Parameters:
widget - the widget making the enquiry
x - the x position, relative to the widget bounds, of the pointer
y - the y position, relative to the widget bounds, of the pointer
Returns:
the command, or NO_OP if nothing to do
